entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Exception thrown on solution load in VSMac #65573
  • Add editorconfig support for `is null` instead of == null (and `not` variant) #65572
  • Roslyn - .Net core solution Compilation Fails #65567
  • VerifyAllCodeStyleFixersAreSupportedByCodeCleanup tests are failing #65566
    17.5
  • Debug-only test failures in ExternalDiagnosticUpdateSourceTests #65563
  • Analyzers created with Microsoft.CodeAnalysis 4.4.0 cannot be used with .net 6 #65562

Closed

  • Types are not suggested after `required` modifier #65556
  • 'Use pattern matching' should prefer 'Coalesce with throw expression' #65323
  • Latest LSIF generator explodes failing to find service for ILspHoverResultCreationService #65367
    17.5
  • Not able to get symbols for Referenced dlls when loading a solution async #25311
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33121.346 #65554

PullRequests

Created

  • View Call Hierarchy - fix thread block (#65452) #65574
    Area-IDE
  • Fix stale inline diagnostics #65571
    Area-IDE
  • Make sure the container syntax node is not GlobalStatements #65570
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65569
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Bump mac editor and implement CocoaTextBufferVisibilityTracker #65568
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add asserts for debug only test failures and fix tests #65565
    Test, Tenet-Reliability
  • Fix expected number of unsupported diagnostic IDs in a test #65564
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65561
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move to multi-column primary keys for our sqlite database. #65553
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Semantic Snippets - Fix snippet priority in completion list #65103
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #65110
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65555
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65495
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • [EnC] Allow reordering of top level statements #65560
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix handling blocks in top level code. #65557
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Results of running the arrow-placement analyzer on roslyn #65475
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add additional cases whre 'use coalesce expression' can simplify code. #65371
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix MEF composition used for the LSIF generator #65512
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65552
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix null ref in add-import #65549
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify how options are checked in the tagger. #65543
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65551
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Out arguments do not contribute val escape #64784
    Area-Compilers
  • Update to latest version of protocol with new pull diagnostic types #65514
    Area-IDE
  • Don't complete parenthesis after 'new' if the type has nested types #63015
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Only complete () if constructor is accessible #65542
    Area-IDE
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65500
    Area-Compilers
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • Emit `ParamArrayAttribute` for synthesized delegates #65533
    Area-Compilers
  • Add lambda defaults/`params` tests from the test plan review #65458
    Area-Compilers
  • Move some severity configurations to globalconfig #65274
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Work some 'scoped' issues on IDE #65407
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support semantic tokens output in LSIF generator #65548
    Area-IDE, Community
  • WIP: Support fine-grained diagnostic tagging. #65547
    Area-IDE
